caller_intent: The caller wants to set up a new insurance policy with automatic monthly payments from their checking account (due to credit card fee issues) and cancel an existing policy that renews on the 31st.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's bank (Wood Forest) and verified routing/account numbers for auto draft setup.
Agent agreed to issue the new policy effective immediately and set up auto draft starting the next day.
Agent advised the caller to cancel the existing policy either on the 31st or immediately if they prefer to avoid a lapse.
Agent mentioned contingency plans (FS forms) in case of DMV issues.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy setup and cancellation processes
Handling payment method restrictions (credit card fees)
summary: Agent helped caller transition from credit card payments to checking account auto drafts for a new insurance policy, coordinated policy issuance, and advised on canceling an existing policy. The caller plans to cancel the old policy after receiving the new policy documents.
